DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Chung, Yan-Yi Anny
Miller, Thomas E. X.
Rudgers, Jennifer A.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Poa alsodes seedling establishment
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Seedling establishment rates of Poa alsodes at the plot level 2008-2011. Column headings as follows: "Plot": plot identifier, "Endo": whether plants in that plot were endophyte-symbiotic (1) or endophyte-free (0), "Year1": beginning year of transition, "Seeds1": total number of seeds produced by plants in that plot , "Recruits2": total number of new recruits to that plot the next year, "P.est": rate of seedling establishment (=Recruits2/Seeds1).
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Plant population and community dynamics
Integral projection model
Mutualism
Symbiosis
Vertical transmission
Demography
Fungal endophyte
Commonness and rarity
